#import the declared chords from "chords"
from code_cell import *

#intro instrumental
with gain(0.5):
    for i in range(2):
        playNote(chord_dfa, beats = 1, sustain = 2)
        rest(0.5)
        playNote(chord_dfa, beats = 2, sustain = 3)
        rest(0.5)
        playNote(chord_egb, beats = 1.5)
        playNote(chord_egb, beats = 0.5)
        playNote(chord_egc)
        playNote(chord_eac)

idata.author: Anonymous
idata.python:
from notes import *

def MImelody():
    playNote(e4, beats = 2, sustain = 3)
    rest(1)
    playNote(g4, beats = 0.75)
    playNote(e4, beats =0.25)
    playNote(d4, beats = 1, sustain = 2)
    rest(1)
    playNote(b3, beats = 0.5)
    playNote(c4, beats = 0.5)
    playNote(d4, beats = 0.5)
    playNote(e4, beats = 0.5)

def MImelody2():
    playNote(e4, beats = 2, sustain = 0)
    rest(1)
    playNote(g4, beats = 0.75)
    playNote(e4, beats =0.25)
    playNote(d4, beats = 1, sustain = 2)
    rest(3)
#Intro instrumental
#4 bars (1-16)
with gain(0.7):
    MImelody()
    MImelody2()

#Chorus
#8 bars (17-48)
#with gain(0.5):
    for i in range(2):
        MImelody()
        MImelody2()
        
rest(64)

for i in range(2):
    #with gain(0.5):
        MImelody()
        MImelody2()
        
rest(64)

for i in range(5):
    #with gain(0.5):
        MImelody()
        MImelody2()

#declaring variables: giving chords names instead of having to refer to their numbers
#using a list to make the chords
chord_dfa = [50, 53, 57]
chord_egb = [52, 55, 59]
chord_eac = [52, 57, 60]
chord_egc = [52, 55, 60]

idata.python:
def bassLine():
    playNote(26, beats = 0.5)
    playNote(26, beats = 0.5)
    rest(0.25)
    playNote(26, beats = 0.25)
    playNote(26, beats = 0.25)
    rest(0.25)
    playNote(26, beats = 1)
    playNote(26, beats = 0.5)
    playNote(26, beats = 0.25)
    playNote(26, beats = 0.25)
    
    playNote(16, beats = 0.5)
    playNote(16, beats = 0.5)
    rest(0.25)
    playNote(16, beats = 0.25)
    playNote(16, beats = 0.25)
    rest(0.25)
    playNote(16, beats = 1)
    playNote(16, beats = 0.5)
    playNote(16, beats = 0.25)
    playNote(16, beats = 0.25)
    
    playNote(29, beats = 0.5)
    playNote(29, beats = 0.5)
    rest(0.25)
    playNote(29, beats = 0.25)
    playNote(29, beats = 0.25)
    rest(0.25)
    playNote(29, beats = 1)
    playNote(29, beats = 0.5)
    playNote(29, beats = 0.25)
    playNote(29, beats = 0.25)

    playNote(19, beats = 0.5)
    playNote(19, beats = 0.5)
    rest(0.25)
    playNote(19, beats = 0.25)
    playNote(19, beats = 0.25)
    rest(0.25)
    playNote(19, beats = 1)
    playNote(19, beats = 0.5)
    playNote(19, beats = 0.25)
    playNote(19, beats = 0.25)

rest(16)

for i in range(2):
    bassLine()

rest(32)

for i in range(4):
    bassLine()
    
rest (32)

for i in range(2):
    bassLine()
    
rest(80)

from magnetic_inst_ import *
#transpose 6
with transpose(6): 
    with gain(0.2):
        playNote(fs3, 0.25)

idata.python:
from notes import *
def chorus():
    playNote(c5, beats = 0.25)
    playNote(c5, beats = 0.25)
    playNote(c5, beats = 0.5)
    playNote(e5)

    playNote(a4, beats = 0.25)
    playNote(a4, beats = 0.25)
    playNote(a4, beats = 0.5)
    playNote(b4)

    playNote(g4, beats = 0.25)
    playNote(g4, beats = 0.25)
    playNote(g4, beats = 0.5)

    playNote(b4, beats = 0.5)
    playNote(c5, beats = 0.5)
    playNote(b4, beats = 0.5)
    playNote(a4, beats = 1.25)
    rest(0.25)
def verse_1():
    playNote(e5, beats = 0.5)
    playNote(e5, beats = 0.5)
    playNote(c5, beats = 0.5)
    playNote(a4, beats = 0.25)
    playNote(g4, beats = 2.25)

    playNote(g4, beats = 0.5)
    playNote(a4, beats = 0.5)
    playNote(c5, beats = 0.25)
    playNote(d5, beats = 0.5)
    playNote(c5, beats = 2.25)

    playNote(e5, beats = 0.5)
    playNote(e5, beats = 0.5)
    playNote(c5, beats = 0.5)
    playNote(a4, beats = 0.25)
    playNote(g4, beats = 2.25)

    playNote(g4, beats = 0.5)
    playNote(a4, beats = 0.5)
    playNote(c5, beats = 0.5)
    playNote(d5, beats = 0.5)
    playNote(e5, beats = 2)

    playNote(e5, beats = 0.25)
    playNote(f5, beats = 0.25)
    playNote(e5, beats = 0.5)
    playNote(c5, beats = 0.5)
    playNote(a5, beats = 0.5)
    playNote(g5, beats = 2)

    playNote(e5, beats = 0.25)
    playNote(f5, beats = 0.25)
    playNote(e5, beats = 0.5)
    playNote(a4, beats = 0.5)
    playNote(d5, beats = 0.5)
    playNote(c5, beats = 2.25)

    playNote(e5, beats = 0.5)
    playNote(e5, beats = 0.5)
    playNote(c5, beats = 0.5)
    #playNote(a4, beats = 0.25)
    playNote(g4, beats = 2.25)

    playNote(g4, beats = 0.5)
    playNote(a4, beats = 0.5)
    playNote(c5, beats = 0.5)
    playNote(d5, beats = 0.5)
    playNote(e5, beats = 0.5)
def pre_chorus_1():
    playNote(c5, beats = 0.25)
    playNote(d5, beats = 0.25)
    playNote(e5, beats = 0.5)
    playNote(d5, beats = 0.5)
    playNote(c5, beats = 0.25)
    playNote(d5, beats = 0.5)
    playNote(d5, beats = 0.5)
    playNote(e5, beats = 0.5)
    playNote(e5, beats = 0.25)
    playNote(d5, beats = 0.5)
    
    rest(0.5)
    
    playNote(e5, beats = 0.5)
    playNote(d5, beats = 0.5)
    playNote(c5, beats = 0.25)
    playNote(d5, beats = 0.5)
    playNote(d5, beats = 0.5)
    playNote(e5, beats = 0.5)
    playNote(e5, beats = 0.25)
    playNote(d5, beats = 0.5)
    rest(0.5)
    playNote(e5, beats = 0.5)
    playNote(d5, beats = 0.5)
    playNote(c5, beats = 0.25)
    playNote(d5, beats = 0.5)
    playNote(d5, beats = 0.5)
    playNote(e5, beats = 0.5)
    playNote(e5, beats = 0.25)
    playNote(d5, beats = 0.5)
    
    #rest(0.25)

    playNote(b4, beats = 0.5)
    playNote(c5, beats = 0.5)
    playNote(d5, beats = 0.5)
    playNote(e5, beats = 0.5)
    playNote(b4, beats = 1)
    playNote(a4, beats = 1.25)
def pre_chorus_2():
    rest(0.25)
    playNote(e5, beats = 0.5)
    playNote(d5, beats = 0.5)
    playNote(c5, beats = 0.25)
    playNote(d5, beats = 0.5)
    playNote(d5, beats = 0.5)
    playNote(e5, beats = 0.5)
    playNote(e5, beats = 0.25)
    playNote(d5, beats = 0.5)
    
    rest(0.5)
    
    playNote(e5, beats = 0.5)
    playNote(d5, beats = 0.5)
    playNote(c5, beats = 0.25)
    playNote(d5, beats = 0.5)
    playNote(d5, beats = 0.5)
    playNote(e5, beats = 0.5)
    playNote(e5, beats = 0.25)
    playNote(d5, beats = 0.5)
    rest(0.5)
    playNote(e5, beats = 0.5)
    playNote(d5, beats = 0.5)
    playNote(c5, beats = 0.25)
    playNote(d5, beats = 0.5)
    playNote(d5, beats = 0.5)
    playNote(e5, beats = 0.5)
    playNote(e5, beats = 0.25)
    playNote(d5, beats = 0.5)
    
    #rest(0.25)

    playNote(b4, beats = 0.5)
    playNote(c5, beats = 0.5)
    playNote(d5, beats = 0.5)
    playNote(e5, beats = 0.5)
    playNote(b4, beats = 1)
    playNote(a4, beats = 1.5)
#________________________________________________________________________
#rest(14.02)
rest(14)
#meow
with gain(0.5):
    playSound(6892, beats = 3)
#intro chorus (bars 17-49)
for i in range(4):
    chorus()
#intro verse (bars 50-80)
rest(0.5)
verse_1()
#prechorus 1 (bars 81-97)

pre_chorus_1()
#prechorus 2 (bars 97-113)
pre_chorus_2()
#chorus (bars 114-145)
rest(0.5)
for i in range(4):
    chorus()
#__________________________________________________________
rest(0.5)
verse_1()

pre_chorus_1()

pre_chorus_2()

rest(0.5)
for i in range(8):
    chorus()

rest(15)
